users.name: Afghanistan
users.info: officially the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, is a landlocked country located at the crossroads of Central Asia and South Asia.

users.name: Albania
users.info: officially the Republic of Albania, is a country in Southeastern Europe.

users.name: Algeria
users.info: officially the People's Democratic Republic of Algeria, is a country in North Africa.

users.name: Andorra
users.info: officially the Principality of Andorra, is a sovereign landlocked microstate on the Iberian Peninsula, in the eastern Pyrenees, bordered by France to the north and Spain to the south.

users.name: Angola
users.info: officially the Republic of Angola, is a country located on the west coast of central-southern Africa.

users.name: Antigua and Barbuda
users.info: is a sovereign country in the West Indies. It lies at the juncture of the Caribbean Sea and the Atlantic Ocean in the Leeward Islands part of the Lesser Antilles, at 17°N latitude.

users.name: Argentina
users.info: officially the Argentine Republic, is a country in the southern half of South America.

users.name: Armenia
users.info: officially the Republic of Armenia, is a landlocked country in the Armenian Highlands of Western Asia.

users.name: Australia
users.info: officially the Commonwealth of Australia, is a sovereign country comprising the mainland of the Australian continent, the island of Tasmania, and numerous smaller islands.

users.name: Austria
users.info: The Republic of Austria, commonly just Austria, is a country in the southern part of Central Europe, lying in the Eastern Alps.

users.name: Azerbaijan
users.info: officially the Republic of Azerbaijan, is a transcontinental country located at the boundary of Eastern Europe and Western Asia.

users.name: Bahamas
users.info: officially the Commonwealth of The Bahamas, is an island country within the Lucayan Archipelago of the West Indies in the North Atlantic.

users.name: Bahrain
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Bahrain, is an island country in Western Asia.

users.name: Bangladesh
users.info: officially the People's Republic of Bangladesh, is a country in South Asia.

users.name: Barbados
users.info: is an island country in the Lesser Antilles of the West Indies, in the Caribbean region of the Americas, and the most easterly of the Caribbean Islands.

users.name: Belarus
users.info: officially the Republic of Belarus, is a landlocked country in Eastern Europe.

users.name: Belgium
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Belgium, is a country in Northwestern Europe.

users.name: Belize
users.info: is a Caribbean and Central American country on the northeastern coast of Central America.

users.name: Benin
users.info: officially the Republic of Benin , and formerly Dahomey, is a country in West Africa.

users.name: Bhutan
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Bhutan, is a landlocked country in South Asia. It is situated in the Eastern Himalayas, between China in the north and India in the south.

users.name: Bolivia
users.info: officially the Plurinational State of Bolivia, is a landlocked country located in western-central South America.

users.name: Bosnia and Herzegovina
users.info: sometimes called Bosnia–Herzegovina and often known informally as Bosnia, is a country at the crossroads of south and southeast Europe, located in the Balkans.

users.name: Botswana
users.info: is a landlocked country in Southern Africa. Botswana is topographically flat, with approximately 70 percent of its territory being the Kalahari Desert.

users.name: Brazil
users.info: officially the Federative Republic of Brazil, is the largest country in both South America and Latin America.

users.name: Brunei
users.info: is a country located on the north coast of the island of Borneo in Southeast Asia. Apart from its South China Sea coast, it is completely surrounded by the Malaysian state of Sarawak.

users.name: Bulgaria
users.info: is a country located on the north coast of the island of Borneo in Southeast Asia. Apart from its South China Sea coast, it is completely surrounded by the Malaysian state of Sarawak.

users.name: Burkina Faso
users.info: is a landlocked country in West Africa with an area of 274,200 km2 (105,900 sq mi), bordered by Mali to the northwest, Niger to the northeast, Benin to the southeast, Togo and Ghana to the south, and the Ivory Coast to the southwest.

users.name: Burundi
users.info: is a landlocked country in the Great Rift Valley at the junction between the African Great Lakes region and East Africa.

users.name: Ivory Coast
users.info: also known as Côte d'Ivoire, officially the Republic of Côte d'Ivoire, is a country on the southern coast of West Africa.

users.name: Cabo Verde
users.info: officially the Republic of Cabo Verde, is an archipelago and island country in the central Atlantic Ocean, consisting of ten volcanic islands with a combined land area of about 4,033 square kilometres (1,557 sq mi).

users.name: Cambodia
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Cambodia, is a country located in the southern portion of the Indochinese Peninsula in Southeast Asia.

users.name: Cameroon
users.info: officially the Republic of Cameroon (French: République du Cameroun), is a country in west-central Africa.

users.name: Canada
users.info: is a country in North America. Its ten provinces and three territories extend from the Atlantic Ocean to the Pacific Ocean and northward into the Arctic Ocean.

users.name: CAR
users.info: The Central African Republic (CAR) is a landlocked country in Central Africa. It is bordered by Chad to the north, Sudan to the northeast, South Sudan to the southeast, the DR Congo to the south, the Republic of the Congo to the southwest, and Cameroon to the west.

users.name: Chile
users.info: officially the Republic of Chile, is a country in the western part of South America.

users.name: China
users.info: officially the People's Republic of China (PRC), is a country in East Asia. It is the world's most populous country, with a population exceeding 1.4 billion, slightly ahead of India.

users.name: Colombia
users.info: officially the Republic of Colombia, is a country in South America with insular regions in North America—near Nicaragua's Caribbean coast—as well as in the Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Comoros
users.info: officially the Union of the Comoros, is an independent country made up of three islands in southeastern Africa, located at the northern end of the Mozambique Channel in the Indian Ocean.

users.name: Congo
users.info: The Republic of the Congo, also known as Congo-Brazzaville, the Congo Republic or simply either Congo or the Congo, is a country located in the western coast of Central Africa to the west of the Congo river.

users.name: Costa Rica
users.info: officially the Republic of Costa Rica, is a country in the Central American region of North America, bordered by Nicaragua to the north, the Caribbean Sea to the northeast, Panama to the southeast, the Pacific Ocean to the southwest, and maritime border with Ecuador to the south of Cocos Island.

users.name: Croatia
users.info: officially the Republic of Croatia, is a country at the crossroads of Central and Southeast Europe.

users.name: Cuba
users.info: officially the Republic of Cuba, is an island country comprising the island of Cuba, as well as Isla de la Juventud and several minor archipelagos.

users.name: Cyprus
users.info: officially the Republic of Cyprus, is an island country located south of the Anatolian Peninsula in the eastern Mediterranean Sea.

users.name: Czechia
users.info: The Czech Republic, or simply Czechia, is a landlocked country in Central Europe.

users.name: Denmark
users.info: is a Nordic country in Northern Europe. It is the most populous and politically central constituent of the Kingdom of Denmark.

users.name: Djibouti
users.info: officially the Republic of Djibouti, is a country in the Horn of Africa, bordered by Somalia to the south, Ethiopia to the southwest, Eritrea in the north, and the Red Sea and the Gulf of Aden to the east.

users.name: Dominica
users.info: officially the Commonwealth of Dominica, is an island country in the Caribbean.

users.name: Dominican Republic
users.info: The Dominican Republic is a country located on the island of Hispaniola in the Greater Antilles archipelago of the Caribbean region.

users.name: North Korea
users.info: officially the Democratic People's Republic of Korea (DPRK), is a country in East Asia.

users.name: Democratic Republic of the Congo
users.info: The Democratic Republic of the Congo, informally Congo-Kinshasa, DR Congo, the DRC, the DROC, or the Congo, and formerly and also colloquially Zaire, is a country in Central Africa.

users.name: Ecuador
users.info: officially the Republic of Ecuador, is a country in northwestern South America

users.name: Egypt
users.info: officially the Arab Republic of Egypt, is a transcontinental country spanning the northeast corner of Africa and southwest corner of Asia via a land bridge formed by the Sinai Peninsula.

users.name: El Salvador
users.info: officially the Republic of El Salvador, is a country in Central America.

users.name: Equatorial Guinea
users.info: officially the Republic of Equatorial Guinea, is a country on the west coast of Central Africa, with an area of 28,000 square kilometres.

users.name: Eritrea
users.info: officially the State of Eritrea, is a country in the Horn of Africa region of Eastern Africa, with its capital and largest city at Asmara.

users.name: Estonia
users.info: formally the Republic of Estonia, is a country by the Baltic Sea in Northern Europe.

users.name: Eswatini
users.info: officially the Kingdom of Eswatini and formerly named Swaziland, is a landlocked country in Southern Africa.

users.name: Ethiopia
users.info: officially the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, is a landlocked country in the Horn of Africa.

users.name: Fiji
users.info: officially the Republic of Fiji, is an island country in Melanesia, part of Oceania in the South Pacific Ocean.

users.name: Finland
users.info: officially the Republic of Finland, is a Nordic country in Northern Europe.

users.name: France
users.info: is a country primarily located in Western Europe. It also comprises overseas regions and territories in the Americas and the Atlantic, Pacific and Indian Oceans.

users.name: Gabon
users.info: is a country on the west coast of Central Africa.

users.name: Gambia
users.info: The Gambia, officially the Republic of The Gambia, is a country in West Africa. It is the smallest country within mainland Africa and is surrounded by Senegal.

users.name: Georgia
users.info: is a transcontinental country at the intersection of Eastern Europe and Western Asia.

users.name: Germany
users.info: officially the Federal Republic of Germany, is a country in Central Europe. It is the second most populous country in Europe after Russia, and the most populous member state of the European Union.

users.name: Ghana
users.info: officially the Republic of Ghana, is a country in West Africa. It abuts the Gulf of Guinea and the Atlantic Ocean to the south.

users.name: Greece
users.info: officially the Hellenic Republic, is a country in Southeast Europe. It is situated on the southern tip of the Balkans, and is located at the crossroads of Europe, Asia, and Africa.

users.name: Grenada
users.info: is an island country in the West Indies in the Caribbean Sea at the southern end of the Grenadines island chain.

users.name: Guatemala
users.info: officially the Republic of Guatemala, is a country in Central America. It is bordered to the north and west by Mexico.

users.name: Guinea
users.info: officially the Republic of Guinea, is a coastal country in West Africa.

users.name: Guinea-Bissau
users.info: officially the Republic of Guinea-Bissau, is a country in West Africa that covers 36,125 square kilometres (13,948 sq mi) with an estimated population of 1,726,000.

users.name: Guyana
users.info: officially the Co‑operative Republic of Guyana, is a country on the northern mainland of South America.

users.name: Haiti
users.info: officially the Republic of Haiti and formerly known as Hayti, is a country located on the island of Hispaniola in the Greater Antilles archipelago of the Caribbean Sea, east of Cuba and Jamaica.

users.name: Holy See
users.info: The Holy See, also called the See of Rome, Petrine See or Apostolic See, is the jurisdiction of the Pope in his role as the bishop of Rome.

users.name: Honduras
users.info: officially the Republic of Honduras, is a country in Central America.

users.name: Hungary
users.info: is a landlocked country in Central Europe.

users.name: Iceland
users.info: is a Nordic island country in the North Atlantic Ocean and in the Arctic Ocean. Iceland is the most sparsely populated country in Europe.

users.name: India
users.info: officially the Republic of India, is a country in South Asia. It is the seventh-largest country by area, the second-most populous country, and the most populous democracy in the world.

users.name: Indonesia
users.info: officially the Republic of Indonesia, is a country in Southeast Asia and Oceania between the Indian and Pacific oceans. It consists of over 17,000 islands, including Sumatra, Java, Sulawesi, and parts of Borneo and New Guinea.

users.name: Iran
users.info: officially the Islamic Republic of Iran, and also called Persia, is a country located in Western Asia.
